body.title: Egypt's First Phone Charging Network
body.description: is Egypt's very first flexible, affordable, and accessible phone charging network. We’ve made it easy to charge your device on the Go with Octi vault stations in convenient locations, So you can Rent and Return a portable charger Anytime Anywhere DOWNLOAD the App and find the nearest Powerbank
body.subDescription: * Coming soon on iPhone, iPad and all Android devices

body.title: How it works
body.desription: With premium locations all Over Egypt, it's very Easy and convenient to Rent an OCTI VAULT Powerbank.

singleWork.stepDescription: The Nearest OCTI Station With OCTI Vault App
QR Code on OCTI Station & get a power bank
On the Go with OCTI Power-Bank
Power bank to Any OCTI Station in Egypt

promo.promoDescription: You can find OCTI Power Banks in many of your favorite spots. You can return a power bank to any OCTI station in the city Charge your devices anywhere, anytime
Octi Vault power banks are offered with pre-attached cables lightning cable (iPhone), USB-C cable, and MicroUSB Certified with CE, FCC and CB safety marks.
Reducing the demand on the planet’s Lithium resources, by sharing. All our power banks are recycled at the end of use.
The cost of renting a power bank is affordable and low price Save your money! It is more economical to rent a power bank than buying or owning one

body.title: Octivault Price Plans
body.description: Octi vault provides Affordable prices. Rates may vary, depending on location. Please check out each station individually in our app for relevant rates.

questions.title: Who are we?
questions.answer: Octi Vault is Egypt's 1st smart and fully automated power bank rental platform. Our vision is to make hassle-free and affordable charging solution available to everyone. Octi Vault is easy to use, reliable, convenient, and timesaving. With the network of internet-connected Octi Stations, users can now pick up and drop the power bank anywhere while on the move. They can continue what they want without the fear of getting disconnected. Our aim is to bring down the Lithium footprint by removing the need for people to own power banks and replace it with a shared economy of power banks.

questions.title: How secure is the power bank? Is Octi Vault safe?
questions.answer:
Octi Vault has self-designed its power banks and safety and security is top priority to us.
Only the charging ports are enabled and there are no data lines in the power bank cables to avoid any misuse and ensure safety of your personal & valuable data.
Safe to be carried onboard a Flight.
Intelligent Hardware tracks tampering and damage
Temperature control to avoid heating.
Octi Vault Dispensers and power banks are BIS & CE certified.

questions.title: Octi Vault power bank specifications
questions.answer:
Our power bank comes with the latest and high-speed charging technology
It can recharge all kinds of mobile, depending on its capacity. Charging might be a little slow in absence of data lines.
Charging time varies from Phone to Phone
It also comes with a USB 2.0 port to connect external cable to it
Power bank specifications are printed at the back of each power bank

questions.title: What is the capacity of a Octi Vault power bank?
questions.answer: Each Octi Vault power bank is equipped with 5000 mAh Li-ion Polymer battery. It is sufficient to charge a Smartphone from 0 to 100% at-least once. However, newer mobile phones with better capacity are being rolled in market every-day, so charging depends on the capacity of the mobile phones as well. Power bank specifications are printed at the back of each power bank.

questions.title: Can I sign up using an International phone number?
questions.answer: Currently we are supporting only Egyptian phone numbers.

questions.title: How to rent an Octi Vault power bank?
questions.answer:
Follow the procedures below to rent a power bank:
Download the Octi Vault app and sign up
Use the in-app map to Locate and navigate to nearest Octi Vault station
Scan the QR code on the dispenser box and collect the power bank
You will pay after rent is finished

questions.title: How can I find the Octi Vault station near me?
questions.answer: You can find the nearest spot hosting Octi Vault on the app. Open Octi Vault app on your phone and it will show you all the nearest stores available with their status(offline/online) and also availability of power banks. Please ensure that you have granted permission to access location on the Octi Vault app so that it can help you locate the nearest station. You can also search for a location/address to find the nearest stores to that address. You can use in-app navigation feature to navigate to the nearest store.

questions.title: Can I pick the power bank from anywhere and return it anywhere?
questions.answer: Yes, you can. Our smart and connected stations allow you to return power banks to any Octi Vault dispenser anywhere within the city or any other city as well, provided we are operational in that city.

questions.title: Will I be able to rent Octi Vault power bank when my phone is switched off?
questions.answer: At this moment we support only online rentals via app, we do not have support for offline rentals which you can use while your phone is off. Trick: If you remember the password of Octi Vault account, trying logging the same on a different mobile and rent the power bank. Note: Upon successful rent, do not forget to logout on the other mobile phone.

questions.title: How to use the power bank?
questions.answer:
There are 3 cables inbuilt into the power bank – Type C, Micro USB, Lightening Cable
Connect the desired cable
Press the green Power button on the power bank to start charging

questions.title: What to do when the Octi Vault station is empty?
questions.answer: Please navigate to the nearest Octi Vault Box available on the map with some power banks left. You can tap on a store in map view on Octi Vault app to view the number of power banks available for rent. We are deploying Octi Vault at a very fast pace to avoid this problem from occurring again

questions.title: What devices can I charge using Octi Vault power Bank?
questions.answer: The Octi Vault power bank comes pre-attached with Type C, Micro USB and iPhone Lightning cable. There is an additional USB 2.0 port to connect external cable to it. Hence, with these many options you can charge almost any device by connecting external cable if the existing ports put a limitation to your digital charging needs.

questions.title: How do I check the charge level of power bank?
questions.answer: Press the red power button on the side of the power bank. There are 3 LED indicators on the bottom side. The first led represents 50% charge and the second two represents 25% each. For example, if 2 LED lights glow after the button is pressed, it means the power bank is 75% charged.

questions.title: Can I rent multiple Octi Vault power bank at a time?
questions.answer: No, you cannot rent multiple power banks at a time but you can charge multiple devices at a time using the given three cables. If the power bank is discharged you can return it at any Octi Vault station and pick up another one.

questions.title: Can I charge multiple devices at a time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can connect multiple devices at a time and charge them all together, although it is not recommended. The Octi Vault power bank comes pre-attached with Type C, Micro USB and iPhone Lightning cable. There is an additional USB 2.0 port to connect external cable to it. Please note that power bank capacity is limited (max up to 5000mAh) and it can charge only up to its capacity and in case of multiple devices this will get distributed among your devices.

questions.title: Can I charge the Octi Vault power bank at home?
questions.answer: No, the customers cannot charge the power bank on their own. The charging port of Octi Vault power bank is disabled by default. We recommend you to return the power bank and rent a new fully charged power bank once the power bank is discharged.

questions.title: Can I travel to other cities or country with Octi Vault power banks?
questions.answer: Yes, you can. Our charges are as per rental duration so, we will recommend you to avoid if possible. The longer the duration, the higher will be the charges. If you are traveling to a city where Octi Vault is available you can return it there. We are currently operational nationally. Our rental duration limit is 48 hours, beyond which you will be entitled to pay for lost power bank charges.

questions.title: How to return the Octi Vault power bank?
questions.answer:
Follow the below steps to return a power bank at Octi Vault station/store.
Open the Octi Vault app and locate the nearest Octi Vault station
Navigate there and drop the power bank in any of the empty slots available in the box
Make sure the LEDs on Octi Vault Dispenser is on and stable.
Once successful, a notification will appear on the APP
You will hear a click and LEDs on power bank will turn on as an indication of successful return
Do not return the power bank into a Octi Vault station on which LEDs are turned off or blinking.

questions.title: How to swap my Octi Vault power bank?
questions.answer: To swap your power bank from an ongoing rental, check on the map for the nearest Octi Vault Station and drop the power bank into an empty slot on Octi Vault dispenser. Upon confirmation of closing the existing rental on the app, you can rent a fresh power bank. Kindly note that, our charges are for per rental session if you are a standard user but subscribed users can do unlimited swaps during their subscription period.

questions.title: What to do when the Octi Vault station is full?
questions.answer: Please navigate to the nearest Octi Vault Box available on the map with some empty slots left. We are deploying Octi Vault at a very fast pace to avoid this problem from occurring again.

questions.title: Can I leave the power bank into an offline station?
questions.answer: Definition of offline station: Kindly check for the box status on the app, if the box shows green then it is an active box and if the box has turned grey on the app it means either the box is out of network or the power supply is discontinued which counts as an offline box. If the dispenser is powered you will see the green LED lights on and in case you don’t see any LED lights on the dispenser then kindly use the map provided on the app to navigate and locate the nearest Octi Vault station and return the power bank as per your convenience. If the box is powered and if you find the LED lights are blinking/flickering on the station, it means the box is lacking network connectivity. In such cases, you can still drop the power bank in the station and it will get locked, however the session will end only when the station gets reconnected to the network automatically. You will notice the timer running on the APP and you won’t get any notification saying the session has ended. However, you won’t be charged anything extra as the station has the capability to record the timings of your return and you will be charged only for that time period.

questions.title: What if the power bank is not returned for a long period of time?
questions.answer: We charge for rent based on duration, the longer you keep the power bank with you the higher will be the charges. Beyond 48 hours, we will raise the charges for lost power bank against your account and you need to clear the charges to continue using Octi Vault service

questions.title: What if I lost the power bank?
questions.answer: Please inform the customer care immediately. We will raise the charges for lost power bank against your account and you need to clear the charges to continue using Octi Vault service and to avoid legal action. If you are a subscribed user your subscription will be terminated and the difference amount needs to be paid. This is to notify you that the policy for lost/Unreturned power banks as signed by you during the registration on the app, stating that the user has to pay the necessary charges up-to Rs. 699 is clearly mentioned under Section 5- 5.1.i in our T & C. Kindly go through the Terms and conditions for a clear picture. Terms and conditions- Octi Vault https://OctiVault.io/terms.html

questions.title: Unable to receive OTP to register or to change password?
questions.answer: Please check your network connection and retry. If still unable to receive the OTP, please contact our support team via email or phone.

questions.title: The Octi Vault app is not working as expected?
questions.answer:
Sometimes cache and network glitches caused unexpected behavior on apps, You can try the below steps if the Octi Vault app is not working.
Please close the app and restart it
If it still doesn’t work, please re-install the Octi Vault app and retry
If the problem persists, then please contact our support team via email or app support.

questions.title: Octi Vault station unable to release/unlock a power bank?
questions.answer:
If the Octi Vault dispenser is not able to dispense a power bank, then
Open the app and go to support option on the menu
Select the issue type as Octi Vault station station from the dropdown list provided
Scan the QR code on the station and submit
Navigate to the another nearest Octi Vault station as given on the app and rent a power bank
Your active session will end automatically in 2-3 mins if the power bank is not ejected from the dispenser.

questions.title: My rental session has started but the power bank did not unlock from the station
questions.answer: This might happen if the station is not connected to network, please wait up-to 3 mins and the session will end automatically. There will be no charges in such cases. Please contact our support team via email or app support. if the rental does not end post 3 mins.

questions.title: Faulty power bank unlocked/Power bank not working.
questions.answer:
At Octi Vault, we always ensure that we eject the best available power bank to the user, however to ensure that there are no issues please check for physical damages and verify that power bank is working properly. In case you observe any issues please return it immediately and rent another power bank. Keep in mind that you won't be charged for the session if you drop the power bank within 3 minutes after your rental session starts. And make sure to report the issue on the app, our support team will investigate and ensure this is not happening again in future.
Open the app and go to support from the menu
Then select the issue type as Power Bank from the drop-down list providedDrop the power bank in the Octi Vault Box to rent a new one.

questions.title: What to do if power bank is not sufficiently charged when dispensed?
questions.answer: We never dispense a power bank that is less than 80% charged. However, if you find such power bank then report to us via the support option on the app. Drop the power bank in the station and re-rent another one. There are 3 LED indicators on the bottom side. Press the green button on power bank to check the charge level.

questions.title: What can I do if Octi Vault power bank cables are not compatible to my device?
questions.answer: Octi Vault power bank comes with all standard cables as per market. As of now we have support for Apple lightning cable for iPhones and Micro-USB & USB C for Android phones.

questions.title: Why am I not able to insert the power bank into an empty slot while returning it?
questions.answer: Before returning the power bank, please ensure that station is on and connected (you can confirm it by looking at LED lights on Octi Vault station, LEDs should be stable and not blinking). Octi Vault dispenser and power banks are smartly designed to allow insert only in one direction and it will insert smoothly, look for the sign (Insert this side) on power bank, please do not use force to insert and do not leave the power bank in the dispenser if not locked properly. If faced with any difficulty while returning the power bank, kindly navigate on the map to relocate the nearest Octi Vault station to return the power bank and do report this issue using the support section on the app.

questions.title: My rental session has not ended despite of returning the power bank
questions.answer: While returning the power bank into Octi Vault station, please ensure that the power bank is properly locked. You will hear a locking sound from the dispenser after dropping it and the LED lights on the power bank starts blinking as an indication of charging. Also ensure that your rental session has ended and you have received a notification on the app. Please allow notifications on the Octi Vault app to end the rental session automatically. If not allowed you might have to manually refresh the session screen to verify that the rental has ended successfully. In case of any further issues reach out to our customer care.

questions.title: What are the rental charges?
questions.answer: The rental charges have been provided under the “Plans” option on the side menu

questions.title: By paying for full day rent, will I be able to swap power banks as many times as needed for 24 hours?
questions.answer: No, Charges are per rental basis. If you are a standard user you will be charged separately for each rental.

questions.title: Are cash payments allowed?
questions.answer: No, we do not accept cash payments via the Octi Vault app. However, you can get your wallet recharged through the store operator using his wallet top up method and pay cash to him directly.

questions.title: Rental charges are not as expected?
questions.answer: In case you feel any discrepancy in the rental charges, please report this issue at info@octivault.com with the transaction details and we will assist you on this.

questions.title: How to refer friends?
questions.answer:
You can find your referral code via clicking on gift box icon on Top right of home screen or alternatively you can use the below steps.
Click on Menu bar on the top left corner
Click on settings
Click on the referral code in green color on the top
Click on invite
Share the referral code to your friends using the required option
Your friend will get additional 3 free rentals each 1-hour i.e. First 3 hours. What you get?
Standard Users : you will get 5 free rentals each 1-hour i.e. First 5 hours. Share your referral code and ask your friend to apply this code during the registration on Octi Vault app. You and your friend will receive the respective rewards on your friend's first transaction on the Octi Vault app.

questions.title: How can I use the coupons?
questions.answer:
The coupons will not be automatically applied. You have to apply the coupons manually before scanning the QR code on the dispenser box and then rent a power bank. Follow the steps below in order to apply coupons:
Click on rent an Octi Vault
On top of QR scanner you will find an option """"Apply coupons""""
Click on it and the coupon will appear on the screen
Apply the required coupon and scan the QR code in order to rent a power bank
If you forgot to apply coupon while renting, don't worry you can still apply coupon while your rental is on. Please follow the below steps.
Go to coupons screen.
If the coupon not applied already, you will find an option """"redeem coupons""""
Click on it and select, insert the coupon code.

questions.title: Where can I find my discount coupons?
questions.answer:
Follow the steps below to find discount coupons in your account:
Click on Menu bar
Click on promotions/vouchers
All active coupons will be visible here

questions.title: How to ask for installation at a new store?
questions.answer:
You can connect with us via our app or our mobile app. Follow the steps below in order to post your requirement of Octi Vault in mobile app:
Click on Menu bar on the left corner
Click on become a partner
Fill up all the required details connect with you and also provide a brief summary/message and you will be contacted by the sales team.

questions.title: How to get Octi Vault services for a 2-3-day event/Expo in your city?
questions.answer: Kindly contact customer support team, contact details are provided on our web page.

questions.title: Report misuse?
questions.answer:
To report any misuse or damage like the ones mentioned below please contact us via support option in Octi Vault app.
Broken cable of power bank
QR code damaged
Station QR code damaged
Damaged power bank
Damaged station

questions.title: Is the power bank waterproof?
questions.answer: Keep the Power Bank away from heat sources, direct sunlight, humidity, water or other liquids. Also avoid contact with fire and sharp objects.

questions.title: What are the precautions I should take while using the power bank?
questions.answer: Octi Vault believes in the power of shared economy and is committed to sharing and rental of power banks. This is cost effective also and you need not to bother about the maintenance and charging of the power bank. This shared model makes our environment sustainable. We promote renting and sharing model.

body.title: Join The Revolution. Transform Your Business
body.description: Partner with Octi Vault to provide convenient charging to customers. Being an Octi Vault partner is completely free of charge and means that we are handling all customer support and installation and refill of stations when needed

body.title: Download OCTI App
body.description: Egypt's first phone charging network Octi Vault gives you power on demand through its network of portable power banks. Whilst providing venues with a unique marketing tool that drives footfall and increases dwell time. Octi App is available for all devices , Download the app to find your nearest location!
